name.jp: バイクーン・ブルーム

description.en: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.ar: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.br: Embora não seja a moto mais rápida de Madrigal, a Moto voadora Hera certamente compensa isso com seu grande estilo!
description.cns: 虽然不是瑞加大陆最快的飞行器，但幻影光轮肯定是最酷的！
description.de: Gleite mit Stil durch die Lüfte!
description.fi: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.fil: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.fr: Bien que ce ne soit pas la monture la plus rapide, ce hoverbike ne manque pas de style !
description.id: Meskipun bukan sepeda tercepat di Madrigal, Hera Hoverbike tentu saja menggantikannya dengan gaya!
description.it: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.jp: マドリガル最速のバイクではないものの、バイクーン・ブルームはこのスタイリッシュさが売り！
description.kr: 마드리갈에서 제일 빠르진 않지만, 헤라 호버바이크는 스타일로 그것을 보완합니다!
description.nl: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.pl: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.ru: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.sp: Aunque no es la moto más rápida de Madrigal, ¡la Hera Hoverbike lo compensa con estilo!
description.sw: While not the fastest bike in Madrigal, the Hera Hoverbike certainly makes up for it in style!
description.th: แม้ว่าจะไม่ใช่จักรยานยนต์ที่เร็วที่สุดใน Madrigal แต่ Hera Hoverbike ก็สร้างมาเพื่อมันอย่างมีสไตล์อย่างแน่นอน!
description.tw: 雖然不是瑪德利賈最快的騎乘，但飛行歐兜麥肯定在風格上彌補了它！
description.vi: Mặc dù không phải là chiếc xe đạp nhanh nhất ở Madrigal, nhưng Hera Hoverbike chắc chắn đã tạo nên phong cách cho nó!
